summary: I HAD TO REPLACE 5 SERPENTINE BELTS AND 2 FAN BELTS IN THE PAST 2 YEARS, ALONG WITH THE PULLEYS TWICE. THE ALIGNMENT WAS CHECKED TO. BUT FOR SOME   REASON IT KEEPS HAPPENING. I CALL A DEALERSHIP WHERE I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE AND THEY SAID NO RECALL ON THIS YEAR BUT ON THE 1995,  I TOLD THEM THAT MY CAR WAS MADE OCT. 1995. I DIDN'T HAVE WORK DONE AT THE DEALER SINCE I COULDN'T GET TIME OFF FROM WORK. SO I USED A SHOP NEAR MY JOB. THE VAN IS MAKING THE SAME NOISE AGAIN THAT IT MAKES BEFORE THE BELT FAILS, A CHRIPPING AND SQUEAL
